summary: Leon Mortier, a wealthy publisher, whilst driving through the forest one day, stops when he sees Lulu walking down the long narrow road. She gets into the car. Leon is amused and intrigued ... See full summary »
cast: Vlatka Simac|Titus Muizelaar|Hugo Metsers|Nello Mirando|Willeke van Ammelrooy|Maiko Kemper|Adelheid Roosen|André Arend van de Noord|Georgina Verbaan|Stef van der Eijnden|Roos Metsers|Devon Schoemaker|Catherine Henegan|Lot Smit|Ruby Greeve|Hans Seyferth|Tata Mirando|Lupa Mirando|Paul Hermans|Nello Mirando Jr.
title: Lulu
